meanings.sent1: Bobby is such an assholes for stealing my lunch money.

meanings.definition: A stupid, irritating, or contemptible person.
meanings.sent1: Don't be such an assholes and just admit you were wrong.
meanings.sent2: She always hangs out with assholes who never take anything seriously.
